Listing 24.18: Example of a function to summarize the results of a parameterized experiment.
These updates will allow us to directly compare the results of a model ﬁt as before and a
model ﬁt on the dataset after it has been standardized. It is also a generic change that will
allow us to evaluate and compare the results of other sets of parameters in the following sections.
The complete code listing is provided below.
# cnn model with standardization for the har dataset
from numpy import mean
